text:
May 26, 1954
Mrs. Eleanor N. Bangor
Program Director
Radio Station WQXR
229 West 45 Street
New York 26, N.Y.
Dear Mrs. Sanger:
Regarding to "The Human Side of the UN", if you can forward
the 13 tape* direct to Mr. John Holt, the Network Manager of
the NAEB Tape Network, these will he copied and offered to
the member - stations of NAEB. The original tape* will be
returned to you after they have served their purpose. I
presume that the copies which you will furnish will be cleared
of any commercial announcements which will permit the in¬
dividual stations to make live openings and closings.
Once again let me express my deep gratitude for your thought¬
fulness in making this available.
With all best wishes, believe me,
Cordially yours.
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
